name: OpenAPI-MCP (gujord)
description: [项目级] The OpenAPI-MCP proxy translates OpenAPI specs into MCP tools, enabling AI agents to access external APIs without custom wrappers!。来源: https://github.com/gujord/OpenAPI-MCP

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
The OpenAPI-MCP proxy translates OpenAPI specs into MCP tools, enabling AI agents to access external APIs without custom wrappers!

来源: https://github.com/gujord/OpenAPI-MCP
语言: Python
Stars: 64

name: OpenAPI-MCP/test 模块
description: [模块级] OpenAPI-MCP 项目的 test 模块 (test)。来源: https://github.com/gujord/OpenAPI-MCP

genes.title: test 模块说明
genes.content:
**Test server initialization:**
```bash
python test_weather_oslo.py
```

**Test with mcp-remote:**
```bash
npx mcp-remote http://127.0.0.1:8001/sse
```

**Check available tools:**
```bash
curl http://127.0.0.1:8001/health
```
